text: Hakuna kumanikidza muchitendero. Zvirokwazvo, nzira yechokwadi yave inobuda pachena kubva kune nzira yemanyepo. Wese asingatendi muTaaghoot (mifananidzo) uye anotenda muna Allah, anenge abatirira mubato unovimbika wakasimba usingadambuki zvachose. Uye Allah vanonzwa zvikuru, vanoziva zvakanyanya
